original_title: India’s Petronet proposes short-term LNG solutions for CEB
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Indian Energy company Petronet LNG Limited has presented Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara with short-term immediate solutions for the Ceylon Electricity Board's LNG requirements.

"While a long-term plan for LNG will be finalized, options for short term solution to reduce the cost of generation in the next 24 months from the 600+ MW of LNG power plants available will be pursued," he tweeted.
He also thanked Indian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka Gopal Baglay for his efforts to assist Sri Lanka.
Officials attached to the Ministry of Power and Energy, Ceylon Electricity Board, Petroleum Resources Development Secretariat and Petronet LNG attended the discussion.
